titleStmt.title: TO THE Lady Elizabeth Harley, Since Marchioness of Carmarthen, On a Column of Her Drawing.
titleStmt.author: Matthew Prior

bibl.title: TO THE Lady Elizabeth Harley, Since Marchioness of Carmarthen, On a Column of Her Drawing.
bibl.author: Matthew Prior

front.head: TO THE Lady Elizabeth Harley, Since Marchioness of Carmarthen, On a Column of Her Drawing.

lg.l: future Ages shall with Wonder view
These glorious Lines, which Daughter drew;
They shall confess, that could not raise
A fairer Column to the Father's Praise.
